page.title: 06SUNDAY IN MARTIN MILL
page.content: A typical Sunday by Andrea aged 9. Mummy brings me orange juice when I get up. Daddy goes to E.Langdon church where he is Churchwarden and I often read a book like Snoopy. At 10.30am I get dressed and Mummy gets my break_ fast of toast and tea. Daddy comes back with Mary who takes the Sunday School with the seven children who meet at our house. We hear Bible stories,pray,play games and sing action songs. When they have gone we have a Sunday dinner of chicken,roast potatoes and vegetables with apple pie and cream to follow. Daddy washes up and I bake pastry biscuits. In the afternoon I go swimming with Mary at St. Margaret's Country Club. After I go to her house to play before we have baked potatoes for tea. When Daddy takes me home I watch television before bedtime at 8.30pm.
